MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DD6 area of Newport-on-Tay. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:51am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite delays and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:33am on Sunday, 31 January 2021
